mapper.sql: id, label, account, key_no, key_secret, url, del, status, remark, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_platform_account where 1 = 1
and label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and account like '%${account}%'
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_platform_account (label, account, key_no, key_secret, url, del, status, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keySecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update t_platform_account
label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
key_no = #{keyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
key_secret = #{keySecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_platform_account set label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_no = #{keyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_secret = #{keySecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update t_platform_account set del = 0 where label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
